text: {"grade": 1, "reasoning": "The criterion requires explaining that the DUP initiated the boycott of the Northern Ireland Assembly in February 2022 over its continued objection to any customs checks on goods travelling across the Irish Sea. Section 4.3 explicitly states: \"When the DUP boycotted the Assembly (Feb 2022\u2011Oct 2022), they were protesting the lack of any such veto [the Stormont Brake].\" This directly addresses the DUP boycott, the timing (Feb 2022), and the reason (objection to checks/lack of veto power over EU rules affecting GB-NI trade).", "criterion_id": "90be4298-6097-4725-81fc-cddffb2c4148"}
